description:
This course is a must for those interested in improving their current skill levels. Are you new to working with computers and modifying digital documents? If you are used to printing out forms and documents to fill out and sign, then scanning or faxing them to where they need to go, then this course is a must for you! If you are not sure whether you have the ability to edit documents, then this course is definitely for you. Then this is the course for you.

Do you want to make sure you have the 21st century skills employers are looking for now? Do you know what soft skills are? Do you know the difference between leadership and management skills? Do you want to improve your communication skills? Then let's get started!

This primer course is easy to complete. Typical completion time is less than an hour! Still not sure if this course is right for you? Take the quiz in section 2 and see. If you pass, you already have the technical tools you need and can jump right in to building your skills inventory.

But hurry and enroll now because the price will increase to $50 on August 10th!
title: 21st Century Skills for the 21st Century Workplace
